item.title: Leetcode 1151
item.description: 1151. Minimum Swaps to Group All 1’s Together The idea of this solution is: We find the number of 1’s. Then we know that the 1’s have to be in a subarray of the length of all the 1’s. We know that this works because the problem statement says that all the 1’s should be together in any place. Since we know that all the ones should be in a substring of length the number of ones in data, we just have to find the substring with the maximum number of 1’s in it already so, we get the minimum switches.
